Articles.Content: "The rate at which my fuel is burning does not seem appropriate for these conditions."

"This engine is doing really well as a heatshield. Let's push the limits!"

"This altitude should be safe to aerobrake at."

My experiences with Deadly Reentry and aerobraking in the Joolian system.
"I assume this vessel has enough delta-V for the return trip as well."

"What??? This SRB wasn't meant to be decoupled..."

Edited February 19, 2014 by jmiki8
"This vessel appears to have a serious attitude problem."
Just one more launch...
I think this SSTO will still be stable after the payload is deployed in orbit.
Whoops, wrong probe core.

Said this a few times after downloading B9.

"Wait why isn't the lander engine firing, it's got full fuel? Hang on, that's a jet fuel tank isn't it?"

"Wait, I did save after I edited this rocket, right?"

"Where did all the ullage motors go?"

"Maybe one more aerobraking pass, just to be safe."

"Wait, did I just capture in retrograde?"

Edited February 20, 2014 by TerLoki
"This game is an alpha, so you shouldn't criticize it."
"I'm almost positive I quicksaved a few minutes ago" - goodbye three hours.

Upon watching my 32-SRB monstrosity, Ludicrous Lucy, settle onto the launch pad:

"Hmmm...Did my staging just get reshuffled? Oh, well. Light'er up and let's get outa here!"

...or...

"Dang it! Stop doing the fish!!!" ...moments before joint failure and craft fold-up.
"Four struts aught to hold it..."

"Hmmm this looks good and balanced all docked together! Wait why is it wiggling? Uh oh...."

As my space station oscillated itself into oblivion lol

"Dang it! Stop doing the fish!!!" ...moments before joint failure and craft fold-up.

I have never heard of someone refer to that wobbling as 'the fish'. Consider that term stolen
Launching stuff with FAR: "I can totally recover from that spin..."
"We only have 42 seconds of oxygen left in our lander, but we can't get out because it's too busy snogging the mothership!"

"Hey littlebella! Do you want some water? No, Don't jump up there! The keyboards is not for cats!"

My monitor was then blocked out by fur. The bad thing was I was landing a rover on Vall.

My most frequent (and now famous) last word?

"Crap."
"Yes... It should be fine"
This guy should be able to jump from here, no problem....
"And lift off...wait a minute, this is a rescue mission for Jeb. Bill get out."

"Hey littlebella! Do you want some water? No, Don't jump up there! The keyboards is not for cats!"

My monitor was then blocked out by fur. The bad thing was I was landing a rover on Vall.

Best thing for that is to pin them to the desk and hit pause imediatly. Also, quicksave when they make a move for the desk.

What do you mean, the thing isn't working? *Walks underneath engine*

All you have to do is turn this little knob, an-*engine ignites*
